FuncDef: This commands enables the overwriting of a destination MAC address to an operator-configured value for all unicast packets egressing the specified SAP. The command is intended to be deployed with L2 PBF SAP redirect when a remote end of the SAP interface is an L3 interface with a MAC address different from the MAC address of the non-PBF-ed L3 interface. See Filter Policy in the7450 ESS, 7750 SR, 7950 XRS, and VSR Router Configuration Guidefor more details.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the MAC address. Values-1xx:xx:xx:xx:xx:xx or xx-xx-xx-xx-xx-xx.
